text: David A. Shepard (October 6, 1947 â€“ February 4, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Tennessee House of Representatives from 2001 to 2017. In November 2018, Shepard was elected Dickson County Commissioner. He was born in Centerville, Tennessee. Shepard died on February 4, 2021 in Charlotte, Tennessee at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: David Shepard (politician)
